testcase.name: Response status code is 404
testcase.failure: Failed 1 times. Collection JSON ID: 1eff59f8-203d-4909-8986-8e25b7234e1a. Collection name: Account. Request name: GET Request (Login). Test description: Response status code is 404. testcase.name: Response has the required fields - name, email, password, and id
Email is in a valid email format
Response has the required fields - country, phone, address, pincode and id
Each phone number in the response body follows the format 123-456-7890
